name: Meta Box
description:
The future of metaverse payments is here.
Meta Box is revolutionizing global commerce by eliminating cross-border trade barriers. With the support of blockchain technology, we offer a fast, secure, and cost-effective way for individuals and businesses to send and receive funds from anywhere in the world.
Meta Box is also built for the decentralized world of Web3 and the emerging metaverse economy. We enable seamless transactions between the virtual and real worlds, allowing users to easily buy and sell digital assets, goods, and services across multiple blockchain networks.
⭐ Comprehensive security protection technology
Supports backup and recovery with 12/15/18/21/24/36 character Chinese/English/Traditional Chinese mnemonic phrases;
Set an 8-digit wallet password and use fingerprint authentication for secondary protection;
BFMeta/PayMetaChain/BFChainV2/ETHMeta/BFChain/CCChain networks support on-chain transaction password settings for double encryption of assets;
Private keys are encrypted and securely stored locally on your phone, with multiple backup options available to ensure they are not lost.
⭐ User-friendly
Send or receive over 1000+ cryptocurrencies on 8+ major public chains, including ETH/PMC/BSN/BFM/TRON/CCC/BFT, in real-time;
Make payments anytime, anywhere;
Easily resolve transfer issues caused by network congestion with accelerated transactions, ensuring a smoother transaction process;
Supports English, Chinese, Traditional Chinese
⭐ Mint PMC and USDM on PayMetaChain
Use the in-app minting feature to easily mint PMC and USDM tokens on the PayMetaChain with just a few clicks.
⭐ Supports popular cryptocurrency networks:
Ethereum ETH
Binance BSN
TRON TRX
BFMeta BFM
PayMetachain PMC
CCChain CCC
BFChainV2 BFT
BFChain BFT
Download Meta Box for a metaverse cryptocurrency payment wallet experience.
release_date: Fri Aug 16 2024 17:50:47 GMT+0800 (中国标准时间)
author: @Meta Box
@pmchainbox.com
